availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Camp Sigel, Jefferson County, Kentucky. Mustered in on December 24, 1861 and mustered out on November 2, 1864. Veterans transferred to the 4th Kentucky Mounted InfantryOfficer(s): Colonel Walter C. Whitaker and Colonel George T. Shackelford.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 718-749; Joseph R. Reinhart, A History of the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry U.S.: The Boys Who Feared No Noise (Louisville: Beargrass Press, 2000).
